scripts.lint: bunx biome lint --write . && bun run --filter frontend lint
scripts.format: bunx biome format --write . && bun run --filter frontend format
scripts.check: bun run --filter backend check && bun run --filter frontend check
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter backend typecheck && bun run --filter frontend typecheck
scripts.dev: bun run --filter backend dev & bun run --filter frontend dev
scripts.test: bun run --filter backend test && bun run --filter frontend test:e2e
